div.div: Learn more about WCHS' response to the recent Coronavirus outbreak.
The March Board of Trustees Meeting will occur via Google Hangouts on Tuesday, March 31, 2020 at 6pm.
Learn more about scholarship opportunities for high achieving seniors
WCHS Renewed For Five More Years!
In April 2019 WCHS received a five year renewal, the greatest term alloted to charter schools in New York State.
Learn what WCHS can offer your scholar
Are you a community organization, film scout, or an elected official looking for an event space or film location? We may be able to help.

div.div:
The Williamsburg Charter High School unites youth, families, staff, teachers and the community at large in providing young people with the tools necessary to make sense of the world, preparing them in their journey to become citizens of the local and global community.
Young people will accomplish this through participation in a liberal arts education that includes language, literature, writing, science, history, mathematics, the visual and performing arts, technology and explorations in disciplines designed to teach justice, independent thinking, respect and compassion for themselves and others as well as the skills of critical thinking, communication, and research.

h6.span: Take the DOE Survey Now! Check your email for your Survey Access Code and take the survey at NYCSchoolSurvey.org by 6/26.
¡Llene la Encuesta del DOE ahora! Revise su correo electrónico para el código y llene la encuesta al nycschoolsurvey.org antes del 6/26.
